text: Dark Enchantment is a 1949 Australian play by Max Afford. It premiered at the Minerva Theatre in Kings Cross Sydney in 1949. It later toured English provinces. It was adapted for radio on the ABC in 1960.http://www.ausstage.edu.au/pages/event/98571 ==Plot== A young woman becomes obsessed with a ventriloquist. ==References== ==External links== *Australian productions at AusStage Category:Australian plays Category:1949 plays
title: Dark Enchantment
